songs.title: Like Them
songs.lyrics:
Yuh!

[Verse 1]
I worry about you dog
You've been acting kinda funny
And I wouldn't be surprised
If you spend your money
On that fucking stuff
I'm talking about the drugs
The ones that fuck you up
And you know they fucked you up
And I try to pick you up
Can't front, we did some stupid stuff
At the time we scooped the bitches up
To take shit and we left them in the cut
We used to clown on them lames
But I don't feel the same
The way you look inside my eyes
I could tell that you've changed

[Hook]
Cause you look like them
And you act like them
Talk like them
And you walk like them
So you walk like them
Take it way back then
You said you was never gon' be like them
(x2)

[Verse 2]
Get your money, fuck them haters
That is what you told me
See me coming up
You hating cause my team is soaring
Your life is boring
See me touring and my bitches foreign
Okay I know that I said we was gonna be straight in the morning
It's gon' take some time
Yeah it's gon' take some time
But soon enough
If you keep working then we'll gon' be fine
Chilling, chilling
Maybe sitting on a couple of dimes
Chilling, chilling
Maybe sipping on some fucking wines

[Hook]
Cause you look like them
And you act like them
Talk like them
And you walk like them
So you walk like them
Take it way back then
You said you was never gon' be like them
(x2)

[Verse 3]
You ain't gonna slow me
Even though you owe me
For all of the shit I've done
For my closest homie
We was living like bums
And we had a little fun
We did what we did cause we had to get on
But I'm still in the booth working on these songs
With my dogs
I'm always with my dogs
I swear to god we gon' be on
Cause everyone been working hard
I'm with my dogs
Bitch I'm always with my dogs
I swear to god we gon' be on
Cause everyone been working hard

[Hook]
Cause you look like them
And you act like them
Talk like them
And you walk like them
So you walk like them
Take it way back then
You said you was never gon' be like them
(x2)
